actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A resolution to express the sense of the House of Representatives in support of the "Day of Solidarity with Oppressed Jewry".
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that: (1) the President help insure the basic human rights of all peoples of the world; and (2) all countries remove obstacles to free emigration and insure the free exercise of religious beliefs and cultural expression. Expresses congressional support for the "Day of Solidarity with Oppressed Jewry."

titles.title: A resolution to express the sense of the House of Representatives in support of the "Day of Solidarity with Oppressed Jewry".
